awardsHtml:
9 wins & 21 nominations

Screen Producers Australia Awards

2022 Nominee SPA Award
Drama Series Production of the Year
Nash Edgerton (executive producer) - Michele Bennett (executive producer)
2018 Winner SPA Award
Drama Series Production of the Year
Michele Bennett (producer) - Nash Edgerton (executive producer) - Scott Ryan (executive producer) - Jason Burrows (executive producer)

Logie Awards

2022 Nominee Silver Logie
Most Outstanding Actor
Scott Ryan
2022 Nominee Silver Logie
Most Outstanding Supporting Actor
Matt Nable
2019 Winner Silver Logie
Most Outstanding Actor
Scott Ryan

Australian Directors Guild Awards

2022 Winner ADG Award
Best Direction in a TV or SVOD Drama Series Episode
Emma Freeman
2021 Nominee ADG Award
Best Direction in a TV or SVOD Drama Series Episode
Nash Edgerton
2020 Nominee ADG Award
Best Direction in a TV or SVOD Drama Series
Nash Edgerton (Episode: "Monsters (2019)")
2019 Nominee ADG Award
Best Direction in a TV or SVOD Drama Series
Nash Edgerton (Episode: "On Behalf of Society (2018)")

Australian Academy of Cinema and Television Arts (AACTA) Awards

2021 Winner AACTA Award
Best Lead Actor in a Drama
Scott Ryan
2021 Nominee AACTA Award
Best Supporting Actor in a Drama
Matt Nable
2021 Nominee AACTA Award
Best Supporting Actor in a Drama
Justin Rosniak
2021 Nominee AACTA Award
Best Direction in Drama or Comedy
Nash Edgerton (Episode 6: "Ray Who? (2021)")
2021 Winner AACTA Award
Best Screenplay in Television
Scott Ryan (Episode 6: "Ray Who? (2021)")

Australian Screen Sound Guild

2021 Winner ASSG Award
Best Sound for a Drama or Comedy (over 30 Minutes)
Robert Mackenzie (sound supervisor & mixer) - Tom Heuzenroeder (sound supervisor & mixer) - Jed M. Dodge (dialogue & ADR editor) - Leah Katz (dialogue & ADR editor) - Adrian Medhurst (foley artist) - Duncan Campbell (foley recordist) - Ryan Squires (foley editor) - Mick Boraso (sound effects editor) - Stuart Morton (sound effects editor) - Jessica Meier (assistant sound editor) - Nathaniel Watkins (sound recordist) - Andy Duncan (boom operator) - Piotr Wasilewski (sound assistant)

The Equity Ensemble Awards

Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble Series in a Drama Series
Scott Ryan - Damon Herriman - Justin Rosniak - Brooke Satchwell - Nicholas Cassim - Chika Yasumura - Natalie Tran
